definition[0]: a situation in which two people, countries etc become friendly with each other again after quarrelling
example[0]: Her ex-husband had always hoped for a reconciliation.
example[1]: The treaty has brought a new spirit of reconciliation on both sides.
example[2]: The leadership announced a programme of national reconciliation  (=an attempt by all sides to end a war or trouble in a country).
example[3]: The meeting achieved a reconciliation between the groups.
definition[1]: the process of finding a way that two beliefs, facts etc that are opposed to each other can both be true or successful
example[5]: a reconciliation between environment and development
